name: Max Access – DEPRECATED (new plugin available)
author: Ability, Inc.

sections.description:
THIS PLUGIN HAS MOVED – INSTALL THE NEW PLUGIN FOR FUTURE UPDATES
This plugin has been replaced with the new Max Access plugin here: https://wordpress.org/plugins/accessibility-toolbar/#developers

All functionality that was previously available in our Max Access plugin is now available in The Accessibility Toolbar. To migrate to the new plugin simply install it on your website, open The Accessibility Toolbar from inside your WordPress Admin panel, and copy/paste your Max Access license key into the license key field. Make sure to remove the old Max Access plugin from your website after to avoid potential conflicts.

Need a new license key?
You can get one at at https://maxaccess.io/
